description: The MCBS team is in the process of reviewing data operations, and as part of this work, we are utilizing a new administrative source for determining Medicaid participation in order to be more consistent with guidelines suggested by the Federal Medicare-Medicaid Coordination Office at the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS). This paper describes the impact this change will have on estimates of Medicare-Medicaid enrollees in the MCBS.
title: New Administrative Data Source for Identifying Duals In MCBS
